tool_description: Get hourly updated rates for more than 150 currencies since 1999
name: Exchanger Currency Rates Provider
title: Exchanger Currency Rates Provider

api_list.name: Latest Rates
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the exchange rate data updated every 60 minutes.

optional_parameters.name: base
optional_parameters.description: in case of no base the default is EUR

api_list.name: Supported Currencies
api_list.description:
Return the list of all supported currencies including 

- Country Name 
- Country Code
- Currency Code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchanger-currency-rates-provider.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchanger-currency-rates-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://exchanger-currency-rates-provider.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchanger-currency-rates-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description: This API with a separate currency conversion endpoint, which can be used to convert any amount from one currency to another. In order to convert currencies, please use the API's convert endpoint, append the from and to parameters and set them to your preferred base and target currency codes.

api_list.name: Historical Rates
api_list.description: Request the prices of any date between the year 2000 till today.
